tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Blood Pressure Changes,Body Ache,Gallbladder Issues,Thyroid Disorders,
review:
Have you seen any doctor returning your money? Well, that is what exactly happens to me.  My father-in-law, who is from Kullu visited Bangalore and had a gallbladder stone treatment. Treatment happened under careful observations of Dr. JagaDish, Dr. Munni Reddy, and Dr. Vijay Kumar.  My Father-in-Law was very happy with the treatment and consultations he got from Dr. Jagadish. 
Father-In-Law went back to Kullu but he is still under treatment for his thyroid from Dr. Jagadish. He does his test and scan in Kullu and we take consultations in Bangalore from Dr. Jagadish. So last time when I visited him for my father-in-law's consulation he returned the consultation fee and asked me to come directly into the office from next time onwards.
One can do such things only if he is actually meant to serve people. We are visiting him now for last 3 years now and there has been no change in the level of treatment.  I would recommend everyone to visit him once, you won't regret it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Convinces the patient very calmly and soothingly explains the cause of the disease and the remedy provided was very useful and he treated m sister also and she's doing very well and also treated one of our family frnds and doing excellent in his health

tags: None
review:
Good doctor very polite and listening. Visited for lumps in my hands and legs. 
And he was on time .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: A Big No to this Doctor and Sagar Hospital. I had taken my mom for fever and tiredness to sagar emergency and they treated well, however doctor Jagdish Chandra suggested to admit. As part of the treatment he had taken all ********** test such as x ray, scan, HiNI test and took culture test for 3 times without informing us. We were absolutely shocked to see this at the time of bill payment which was 73000. * ********* ***** ******* ******** *** * ****** *** ****** **** *** I recommend keep away from doctor.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited this doc because I had cough while lying down.. he suggested several test and we did all... and got admitted.. *** **** ** *** *** *** ****** *** ** *** ** ***** *** *** *** ******** ** ***** when visited ENT doc at same hospital and I was diagnosed with allergetic rhinitis and I was given a nasal spray as solution.. I still can't figure out were so many test and scan required? ***** ******* ******* *** *********** when I was admitted he used to visit everyday twice and I was charged 750 ×2 each day.. **** ** ****** ********* ** ******* I think when we say we are covered with insurance hospital and doctors think they can bill as much as possible. ******* *** ***** ** *** ******* ***** ** * *** ******* ** **** ********** **** ****** *** ****** ** ****** since I was admitted for a long time at hospital for other medical reasons they could not find visible vein . Every nurse has failed min twice while putting canula or drawing blood. At last I was fed up *** **** ** ****** ** **** *** ********* the entire experience was horrible..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i highly recommend  Dr Jagadeesh Chandra .. very nice person and  Friendly .....reachable most of time

Doctor is qualified. Very humanely. Communication and convincing skill is fantastic. Co-operative.
